set_state(name)[source]¶

sets the state for the voice.

state is one of “BASS”, “ROCK_BASS”, “MID”, “HIGH”, or “SLAVE”. the state is a set of common settings for the voice, e.g. voice-range, embellishment probability, rhythmic variation, movement-mode, etc.
